Ready_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Not so fast! <sp:5:1:0>You're already running low on
vitality! If we competed now, it'd put your
life at stake!
Our contest can wait until you've
recovered your vitality, and so can I!
While_Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious_01>M-my consciousness is f-fading... If I can
j-just...<sp:5:1:0>h-hang on a bit longer...<sp:5:1:0>
LinkWin_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Never thought I'd be out-endured. <sp:5:1:0>But
you've got what it takes, I'll give you that.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You win, so you get to take all. Here,
it's yours.
Ready_Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So, you want to take me on in a contest
of endurance after all? No better place
than here in Gerudo Canyon.
LinkWin_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>But this isn't the end!


My mighty endurance shines brightest in
the scorching heat!

Our next contest of endurance will be held
under the blazing hot sun!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Don't you dare quit on me while you're
ahead. <sp:5:1:0>I'll be waiting!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Ready_Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're back. <sp:5:1:0>Good.


It's time for our rematch! Are you ready
to push your endurance to its limits?
While_Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Heh heh. Our endurance contest has
begun at last.

I'm not yet sure of your mettle, but I am
sure that I will emerge victorious!
Ready_Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure. I'll explain as many times as
you need.

I am the man who withstands, after all.
He who endures...even this.
While_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>My victory is all but assured.


The only question is just how long you
can endure.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Ready_Talk_0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To start, each of us puts <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> on the
line. Then whoever GIVES their all TAKES
it all!
While_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This level of coldness doesn't even
count as cold! It's hardly chilly! Barely
even brisk!
How are you holding up? Do I see you
shivering there?
Ready_Talk_0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>You're prepared to spend <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>...and
compete against me?
While_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What is it? Is your endurance already
at its end?

If you're at your limit, simply climb down.
The moment your feet touch the ground is
the moment you admit defeat.
Ready_Talk_0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The contest will be held on top of those
pillars and lasts from evening till dawn!
While_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're pretty good. I thought you might
throw in the towel right away...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But it's only going to get tougher from
here! Let's see what you're capable of!
Ready_Talk_0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you can endure the frigid cold for that
entire stretch of time, you win.

But if you set foot on the ground or run so
low on vitality that I determine your life is
at stake, you lose immediately!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Happy_00>What's more!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0001>Let's make this a challenge. Anyone can
endure the cold with clothing. So only the
very basics are allowed.
Otherwise, you can do anything else you
want.<sp:5:0:0> Now, are you ready? Haven't lost
your nerve?
While_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>To be blunt, I never thought you would
last this long.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>But the real battle starts here! Steel your
soul and endure!
While_Talk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's only started to get cold!


Shivering? Me? No! I'm...trembling!
Trembling with excitement!
While_Talk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>I'm absolutely not shivering from the
cold! Don't go getting the wrong idea!
While_Talk_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The contest is finally half over... <sp:5:1:0>So?
Is the cold taking it out of you?

Don't your tired feet yearn to rest down
on the ground?
Ground_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


What, did you descend the stone pillar
because you couldn't take the cold?

That means victory is mine.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Temper yourself once more and come
challenge me again! But be warned—
I'll be tempering myself too!
While_Talk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's still half of the contest left! Do
you have the vitality to make it through?

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm eager to see you give it your all!
LinkLose_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I didn't think you'd drop out so easily.
This takes grit. More than most have.
Ready_Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What?! You're chickening out now?


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, <sp:5:1:0>fine. Come again if you want to push
your endurance to its limits!
LinkLose_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You probably did the best you could.
But I've got more in me.
LinkLose_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I thought you were doing great. But
you've really got to go for it if you
hope to be better than me.
Ready_Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Haha!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Right! Then I'll take those <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> now.
LinkLose_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>That was a real battle of endurance...<sp:5:1:0>
Just a little more and I'd have hit my
limit too.
Ready_Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wha— <sp:5:1:0>Your spirit may be willing, but your
wallet is weak!

<sp:3:0:2:0900>The contest requires that we each put
something on the line—<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> is the
very least I can ask for!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmm... <sp:5:1:0>Talk to me again once you've
scrounged up the rupees.
LinkLose_Talk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Temper your body. Steel your will. And
then come challenge me again. Until then,
I'll be doing the same.
Ready_Talk_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Perfect! I'll just hold on to those
for safekeeping.

And tomorrow evening, when the sun
sets...our battle of wills begins!
Ready_Talk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Very good!<sp:0:4:0>Then we compete by the rules I previously
laid out!<sp:5:0:0> Now are you ready? Or will you
bow to cowardice?
Ready_Talk_000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>You there!


You have got to be more than ordinary if
you've come all this way.

Know my name. Rahdo—the man who
withstands! He who endures!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to my <clr:0000>contest of endurance<clr:ffff>,
set in the harsh climes of Gerudo Canyon.
Can you last? Will you prove yourself?
We will each put <clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff> on the line,
and the enduring victor will take all.
While_Talk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm st-still hanging in there. Wh-wh-what
about you?

Y-you're probably gonna want to g-give
up soon, r-right?
Ready_Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>That's what I like to hear! All right,
then let me explain how this contest
of endurance works.
Ready_Talk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS>Heh. I like the cut of your jib. Gotta say,
my blood's on fire here. I'm ready to
get cold!
This contest will whittle you down to
nothing! Your vitality, just draining away!
You'd better get ready for that.
So, you let me know when you're set,
all right?
While_Talk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_01>Y-you're d-definitely at your l-limit, right?


Sh-shouldn't you just g-give up and drop
to the ground already?

I w-won't m-make fun of you if you d-do.
Ready_Talk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Behold! The sun is sinking behind the
western horizon!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Push yourself past your limits! Withstand
the cold until the sun rises in the east
once more! Now get ready<sp:5:0:0> and...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>ENDURE!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
While_Talk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_01>You're...c-clearly exhausted... *wheeze*
I'm b-begging you, just d-descend to the
ground already...<sp:5:1:0>
Ready_Talk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Very well. Come again if you ever want
to give it a try. I'll be waiting here,
enduring until then!
